verbs.description: As [ARG1: we] [V: approach] [ARG2: a midterm election in which the party of the president almost always loses ground] , the GOP is looking for issues such as an Anthony Kennedy retirement , impeachment of Trump , or deep - state conspiracies to motivate its conservative base .
